attributes.action: Place Russian held assets into a Ukrainian Sovereign Wealth Fund.
attributes.additional_details: It will need strong leadership to encourage all parties to divest such assets, rather than sell them to parties indifferent to the situation in Ukraine.
attributes.background: Divest any Government, UK Business and encourage other allied governments and businesses to divest Russian held assets into a Ukrainian Sovereign Wealth Fund.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Seize frozen Russian assets and give proceeds to Ukraine to help with rebuilding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119
